name: Wager (itch)
description:
Wager

Flex your pattern recognition skills in this dice-based match-3 puzzle game where you control the numbers.

Controls

Use the mouse to navigate menus and match dice.
ESC - pause game
F2 - unlock all stages

Credits

UpperC - Code, Art
Aljoscha Guenther - Music, SFX

Godot Game Engine
Aseprite
WindyCity font
